topic.title: PK's Bar and Grill
topic.shortdesc: Our next stop is PK's Bar and Grill, another local restaurant with the best wings in town

image.alt: The main dining area of PK's

li.p: PK's is another of the best restaurants in Blacksburg
They have pool, darts, arcade games, and, best of all, a TouchTunes jukebox
For food, PK's has the best wings in town, as well as arguably the best pizza and burgers
I recommend the teriyaki or citrus chipotle wings, sausage and pepperoni pizza, and the Faculty Street Burger
For drinks, this is another great place to get pitchers of the cheapest light beer possible
